text: mardicceatukkappettirunna a janataye, nam anugrahicca kilakkum patinnarumulla pradesannalute avakasikalakki. annane israyel makkaleatulla ninre nathanre subhavagdanam purttiyayi. avar ksama paliccatinalanit. pharaveanum avanre janatayum nirmiccukeantirunnatum kettippeakkiyirunnatumaya ellam nam takartt tarippanamakkukayum ceytu
